001package gbw.melange.common.builders;
002
003
004import gbw.melange.common.mesh.modifiers.IBevelConfig;
005import gbw.melange.common.shading.IManagedShader;
006import gbw.melange.common.shading.constants.GLDrawStyle;
007import gbw.melange.common.shading.postprocess.IPostProcessShader;
008import gbw.melange.common.shading.services.Colors;
009
010/**
011 * <p>IElementStyleBuilder interface.</p>
012 *
013 * @author GustavBW
014 * @version $Id: $Id
015 */
016public interface IElementStyleBuilder<T> extends IPartialBuilder<IElementBuilder<T>> {
017
018    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBackgroundDrawStyle(GLDrawStyle style);
019    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBorderDrawStyle(GLDrawStyle style);
020
021    /**
022     * Set the background color, image, gradient or others of this element. <br/>
023     * Access various options by grabbing the {@link Colors} service through an autowired field in your view. <br/>
024     */
025    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBackgroundColor(IManagedShader<?> shader);
026
027    /**
028     * Set the border color, image, gradient or others of this element. <br/>
029     * Access various options by grabbing the {@link Colors} service through an autowired field in your view. <br/>
030     */
031    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBorderColor(IManagedShader<?> shader);
032    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBorderRadius(IBevelConfig config);
033    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBorderRadius(double width);
034    IElementStyleBuilder<T> setBorderRadius(double width, int subdivs);
035    IElementStyleBuilder<T> addPostProcess(IPostProcessShader postProcess);
036}
